name: Stranded (itch) (ConairGames)
description: A World-Wide Pandemic Has Shut Off Transportation to Remote Mountain Villages. These People Need Your Help To Make It Through. Fly Your Helicopter and Pickup Crates of Supplies to Deliver to the Remote Mountain Village Before They Run Out. Be Sure To Keep An Eye Out On Your Fuel. The Crates Are Scattered EVERYWHERE. GOOD LUCK!!!!!!
